title: Task 26

question.text: What does performance refer to in the Second Candidate's statement about the website?

answers.feedback: While performance can mean a presentation, in this context, it relates to the functioning of the website.
In a technical context, performance refers to operational effectiveness, not an artistic aspect.
Performance in this context is about the website's operational aspects, not its financial success.

dialogue.text: We were responsible for implementing new features and ensuring that the website had fast performance.

description: The term performance in a technical context often refers to how well a system or component operates, especially in terms of speed, efficiency, and reliability. For websites and software, performance can relate to how quickly pages load, the responsiveness of the application, or the stability of the system under various conditions.
